attributes.action: Require schools to allow pupilsb to bring a mobile phone into school
attributes.additional_details: Students feel unsafe wondering where they go after school. By giving us access (in a certain area) to our phones at break and lunch. We can contact our guardian to arrange a lift, if there is a change of plan or if their working late. We need proper security measures in school, including modern day technology. You should make sure we have access to our phones at break and lunch. Not to forget, you depend on technology, so why are you not letting the future PM have any access to it in school!
attributes.background: Students feel unsafe wondering where they go after school. By giving us access (in a certain area) to our phones at break and lunch. We can contact our guardian to arrange a lift and many more. We need proper security measures in school, including modern day technology.

rejection.details:
We currently have a petition open on this topic which you might like to sign:

Don't ban students from taking mobile phones into school
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590789
